LanguageData.Mousekin_IdeoMeme_Monarchy.label: Rodent Feudalism
LanguageData.Mousekin_IdeoMeme_Monarchy.description: Only the priviledged few may lead; all others must know their place in the great social order.
LanguageData.Mousekin_IdeoMeme_Republic.label: Rodent Republic
LanguageData.Mousekin_IdeoMeme_Republic.description: Every mouse has a voice in how their community should be run.
